eventDecorators.name: DistributedBorrowerWpc
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when WPC is distributed to a borrower.

eventDecorators.name: DistributedSupplierWpc
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when WPC is distributed to a supplier.

eventDecorators.name: MarketWpcMinted
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when market comped status is changed.

eventDecorators.name: NewWpcRate
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when WPC rate is changed.

eventDecorators.name: WpcSpeedUpdated
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a new WPC speed is calculated for a market.

functionDecorators.name: _addWpcMarkets
functionDecorators.description: Add markets to wpcMarkets, allowing them to earn WPC in the flywheel.

parameterDecorators.name: pTokens
parameterDecorators.description: The addresses of the markets to add.

functionDecorators.name: _dropWpcMarket
functionDecorators.description: Remove a market from compMarkets, preventing it from earning WPC in the flywheel.

parameterDecorators.name: pToken
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the market to drop.

functionDecorators.name: _refreshWpcSpeeds
functionDecorators.description: Recalculate and update WPC speeds for all WPC markets.

functionDecorators.name: _setWpcRate
functionDecorators.description: Set the amount of WPC distributed per block.

parameterDecorators.name: wpcRate_
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of WPC wei per block to distribute.

functionDecorators.name: claimWpc
functionDecorators.description: Claim all the comp accrued by holder in the specified markets.

parameterDecorators.name: holder
parameterDecorators.description: The address to claim WPC for.

parameterDecorators.name: pTokens
parameterDecorators.description: The list of markets to claim WPC in.

functionDecorators.name: claimWpc
functionDecorators.description: Claim all wpc accrued by the holders.

parameterDecorators.name: holders
parameterDecorators.description: The addresses to claim WPC for.

parameterDecorators.name: pTokens
parameterDecorators.description: The list of markets to claim WPC in.

parameterDecorators.name: borrowers
parameterDecorators.description: Whether or not to claim WPC earned by borrowing.

parameterDecorators.name: suppliers
parameterDecorators.description: Whether or not to claim WPC earned by supplying.

functionDecorators.name: claimWpc
functionDecorators.description: Claim all the wpc accrued by holder in all markets.

parameterDecorators.name: holder
parameterDecorators.description: The address to claim WPC for.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: wpcAccrued
functionDecorators.description: The WPC accrued but not yet transferred to each user.

functionDecorators.name: wpcBorrowState
functionDecorators.description: The WPC market borrow state for each market.

functionDecorators.name: wpcBorrowerIndex
functionDecorators.description: The WPC borrow index for each market for each borrower as of the last time they accrued WPC.

functionDecorators.name: wpcClaimThreshold
functionDecorators.description: The threshold above which the flywheel transfers WPC, in wei.

functionDecorators.name: wpcInitialIndex
functionDecorators.description: The initial WPC index for a market.

functionDecorators.name: wpcRate
functionDecorators.description: The rate at which the flywheel distributes WPC, per block.

functionDecorators.name: wpcSpeeds
functionDecorators.description: The portion of compRate that each market currently receives.

functionDecorators.name: wpcSupplierIndex
functionDecorators.description: The WPC borrow index for each market for each supplier as of the last time they accrued WPC.

functionDecorators.name: wpcSupplyState
functionDecorators.description: The WPC market supply state for each market.
